Abt: As somebody who grew up on a Bollywood Film set, movies are all I know. For me, toys were replaced by cameras, and storybooks by screenplays. I have always been intrigued by the idea of telling unique, authentic and original stories in a stylistic way, and the films I make are a product of that. Having graduated from the prestigious School of Visual Arts in New York City, He has made films that have been screened at film festivals all around the world and bagged him several awards including Outstanding Achievement in Directing and Best Short Narrative and more.
